__e: You really think that this is all revenge for one murdered girl?
"vengeance is something That society needs "from time to time, "if, for no other purpose,
I slept with her boyfriend a while back, and I slept with him to get back at you for sleeping with all those other girls.
This whole setup is what, payback for what happened to their father?
No, I get it. I understand-- it's payback for what happened to your daughter, isn't that it?
Revenge doesn't do anybody any good.
And you already know vengeance isn't enough.
Revenge never turns out the way you think that it would.
Well, not the hottest sex I've ever had, but in this case, revenge is a dish best served cold.
I understand, revenge is a dish best served cold, but why on earth would you work here, befriend this man, and then wait nearly a year to kill him?
In the heat of it all, sure, but revenge is a dish best served cold, right?
It's like you say, revenge is endless!
Vengeance is in my heart, death in my hand.
Even in death, vengeance is the one thing you can't let go.
He chose vengeance against me, over your life.
It's not just power he craves, it's vengeance, upon me.
The only reason for all their pain and suffering is your revenge against one man.
That's grade retaliation, and you know it.
No, I just think that what you want here is revenge and...
I mean, I got the money, I got revenge and nobody got killed.
